title: Auto-link URLs in post captions so other users can click them

requirements.text: Render any URLs found in a post’s caption/description as clickable links (auto-linking) everywhere the post description is displayed (e.g., in the posts feed PostCard and any post detail views). Links must open in a new tab and use safe anchor attributes.

quotes: Can you make every link attached to a post be clickable by others users!

acceptanceCriteria: When a post caption contains a URL like "https://example.com", it is rendered as a clickable <a> element for all viewers (including non-authenticated users).
Clicking an auto-linked URL opens the destination in a new browser tab/window.
Auto-linked anchors use security attributes equivalent to: target="_blank" and rel="noreferrer noopener".
Non-URL caption text remains unchanged and readable (including spacing/line breaks).

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only).
Do not modify the backend schema or canister APIs for this change.
nonGoals: Adding a dedicated ‘link’ field to posts in the backend.
Implementing rich text editing or Markdown rendering for captions.
Changing authentication, permissions, or visibility rules for posts.
